Body:
I am unable to send data to my ThingSpeak channel, anybody help me out. I can't understand which sections are breaking out since everything is working out well at the serial, I'am using an Arduino Mega and a DHT11 to read temperature and humidity.

Body: That's not a proper HTTP request.
What exactly is the error message? Also, is `YFQJHA81LPGWGYBI` your complete API key?
To end the HTTP request you need atleast a `Host: ` field and two newlines (I think `\n\n`?) to terminate the request.
Why do you use SoftwareSerials? With Arduino Mega you can wire it directly on Hardware.
@rocksteady no error message is being displayed however, no data is being sent over to my thingspeak channel
@TeaAge ive never tried out hardware serials
@gre_gor you got a better idea on a better http request format?
